greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sort the numbers 2^i and 3^j. Then a(n) is the base of the n-th term. Set a(1)=1.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..500
formula: For n > 1: a(n) = 2 + A006899(n) mod 2. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 09 2013
program: a085239 n = a006899 n `mod` 2 + 2  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 09 2013
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 22 2003
